short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Diffeo For Browsers extension, also known as Diffeo Browser Extension (DBE).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Diffeo for Browsers connects to your browser experience, so our machine intelligence algorithms can see what you are reading and writing and augment your workflows.
